subject: BARCLAYS BANK LONDON (UK)
body:
BARCLAYS BANK LONDON (UK)
1,CHURCHILL PLACE,
LONDON E14 5HP.
UNITED KINGDOM
Attn Sir,
Re: Your payment from Barclays Bank London
Based on the disbursement agreement existing between our bank and the Central Bank of Nigeria, we have the privilege to inform you of existing US$3.5M accrued Interest payment from your fund credit on-hold with Barclays Bank London.
It is this amount therefore that we plan to release to you by Draft. The aim of the draft payment is to eliminate excess charges associated with transfer mode of payments.
The Draft is approved for Payment under two (2) Standard Collection Basis;
(1) We have the honor to invite you to Our Bank Information Center at the bank premises in London to enable you pick the Draft with prove of ownership. Representatives not honored.
(2) We can alternatively arrange to deposit your Draft with our Bank upon your intention to operate a Domiciliary Account Balance with us to enable us deposit your Draft in your own account name. On this particular arrangement, we shall forward to you our Account Registration Form to enable you fill the necessary information for the registration of your account with our bank.
After your accounts approval and registration, you will be required to activate your Account Balance with a Minimum Cash Deposit to make your account operational to accommodate the volume of Draft since the Draft cannot be deposited on a Zero Account.
The Barclays Bank has a standing tradition of recognizing and protecting the privacy of its customers. The Bank maintains strict privacy policies to reasonably safeguard customer information from unauthorized intrusions. In other words, your account with us is safe and convenient as Deposit of cash and cheques are allowed.
You will receive a monthly statement from our bank regularly. All your Account information including an Barclays ATM Swift Card will be forwarded to you after the account registration to enable you access your Account from your location.
We will dispatch to you our Account Registration Form as soon as you make your intentions known to us in this option to enable you fill and return to us the FORM for proper documentation and approvals.
We shall decline to further communications with you on your failure or inability to respond positively to our instructions which may precipitate the expiration of your Draft, thereby making it prone to cancellation.
It is our sincere obligations to offer you our satisfactory services.
Faithfully,
Mr. Andrew Morgan
Remittance/Foreign Operation Manager.
Barclays Bank London (UK)

subject: Re:   BARCLAYS BANK LONDON (UK)
body:
Hello Mr. Andrew Morgan,

Thank you for reaching out to me and providing such detailed information about the accrued interest payment from my fund credit with Barclays Bank London. I must say, this is quite a surprise!

I'm curious about a few things though. Could you please explain more about the two Standard Collection Basis that the Draft is approved for? Also, how does the process of activating my Account Balance work?

I appreciate your assurance regarding the privacy and safety of customer accounts at Barclays Bank. It's comforting to know that cash and cheque deposits are allowed.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Graig

subject: Re: BARCLAYS BANK LONDON (UK)
body:
BARCLAYS BANK LONDON (UK)
1,CHURCHILL PLACE,
LONDON E14 5HP.
UNITED KINGDOM

Attn Sir,

*Re: Your payment from Barclays Bank London*
We are in receipt of your message and questions on the two Standard
Collection Basis that the Draft is approved.
(1) We have the honor to invite you to Our Bank Information Center at the
bank premises in London to enable you pick the Draft with yourself with
 prove of ownership. Representatives not honored. In this particular
method, you will have to come to our office to pick up your payment draft
in person.

(2) We can alternatively arrange to deposit your Draft with our Bank upon
your intention to operate a Domiciliary Account Balance with us to enable
us deposit your Draft in your own account name. On this particular
arrangement, we shall forward to you our Account registration Form to
enable you fill the necessary information for the registration of your
account with our bank. In this, if you can not come down to our office to
pick up your payment draft, we can open an online account with us and we
shall lodge your draft into your new online account

After your accounts approval and registration, you will be required to
activate your new account with a minimum balance of £1,500.00 to make your
account operational to accommodate the volume of funds to be deposited in
it since the Draft cannot be deposited in a Zero/non-operational account.

However, the minimum deposit of £1,500.00 you will be required to deposit
for the activation of your new online account is also your money and will
reflect in your new account soon the account is set up and activated and
you can withdraw this money (£1,500.00) from your new online account
immediately after the activation of your online account.

You will receive a monthly statement of your account from our bank
regularly. All your Account information including an Barclays ATM Swift
Card will be forwarded to you after the account registration to enable you
to have full access to your Account from your location.

Please fill and return the form for us to be able to set up the new online
account for your payment and we shall direct you on how to send the
activation fee of £1,500.00 to activate your new account before we can
deposit your payment draft into your new online account.

Once your account is set up and activated and your payment draft deposited
for clearance, we shall give you our online access instruction for you to
be able to access your online account from the comfort of your house using
your computers, you can also withdraw money or transfer the funds in your
online account to any other account of your choice around the world via our
online banking system.

It is our sincere obligation to offer you our satisfactory services.

Faithfully,

Mr.Andrew Morgan
Remittance/Foreign Operation Manager.
Barclays Bank London (UK)

subject: Re: BARCLAYS BANK LONDON (UK)
body:
Hello Morgan,

Thank you for your detailed message. It's quite an interesting proposition you've presented here. I must admit, I'm not very familiar with banking procedures, especially when it comes to online accounts and drafts.

Could you please explain a bit more about the process of setting up an online account? Also, what exactly does activating an account entail? 

You mentioned a minimum deposit for activation. Is this a standard procedure for all new accounts or is it specific to my case?

I'm also curious about the Barclays ATM Swift Card. How does that work and what are its benefits?

I appreciate your patience in answering my questions.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Graig
